title: Spirit Berlin (2014)
overview: Stephan Ziller is an aspring actor who has lost his way and looks for his spiritual compass. He goes looking for answers in spiritual, religious and self-help groups across the city of Berlin. He eventually chances upon a romance with Simone Geißler, but soon grows weary of his spiritual pursuit.
storyline: A young man searches for spiritual healing. He leaps head over heels into the world of Ashrams, centers and communities of Berlin, where he finds the love of a young and beautiful Yoga teacher.
